rule: The output should include special formatting, markup, or additional characters beyond plain text.
input: Economists forecast recession in the next quarter
validityText:
The input "Economists forecast recession in the next quarter" is a string containing text to be classified. According to the input specification, the input can be any piece of text such as a news article or headline, which aligns with this input as it appears to be a headline. The specification also states that the input should be in the English language, which this input is. The input can be of any length, from short phrases to longer articles; this input is a short phrase. Lastly, the specification requires the text to be in plain text format, and this input meets that criterion as well. Therefore, there are no violations of the input specification.

OK
